elements.text:
You are home for a holiday and you notice your siblings are upset with each other. They give you a short answer when you try to talk with them. 

Here are some thoughts that might pop into mind:

texts: I think about doing something nice for them.
I ask myself if I did something wrong.
I think about how it has nothing to do with me.
I think I am the reason that they are fighting, but remind myself that they have a lot going on that doesn't have to do with me.
I wonder if they're arguing about something I did, but then remember that it isn't my fault if they're not getting along.
